info.description:
Extract PhysBone, PhysBoneCollider, VRC Contact Sender/Receiver, and (Unity or VRC) Constraints from the GameObject of the avatar root.
Unity Constraints are converted to VRCConstraints and then deleted.
The default search target GameObject is the Armature object in the avatar root.
warn.search.root.not.child: The search root is not a child of the avatar root
msg.dialog.title: PhysBone Extractor
msg.dialog.keep.pb.version: The version of Physbone will be kept.
msg.dialog.update.pb.version: The version of Physbone will be updated.
